uk.co.bluegumtree.code.java.goodreads.collector.model
Class DataObject

java.lang.Object
  uk.co.bluegumtree.code.java.goodreads.collector.model.DataObject
Direct Known Subclasses:
GoodreadsObject, GoogleObject, OpenLibraryObject
public abstract class DataObject
extends java.lang.Object

A generic data object that contains attributes and methods common to all data sources.

Author:
Sheila Ellen Thomson
